thread.title: SuneraTech Acquires Envizion Tech Pty Ltd; Starts Expansion in Australia & New Zealand
thread.title_full: SuneraTech Acquires Envizion Tech Pty Ltd; Starts Expansion in Australia & New Zealand - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: SuneraTech Acquires Envizion Tech Pty Ltd; Starts Expansion in Australia & New Zealand
text:
SuneraTech Acquires Envizion Tech Pty Ltd; Starts Expansion in Australia & New Zealand
All EBS, Fusion Apps & Fusion MW customers in ANZ can now enhance IT predictability, productivity & innovation with SuneraTech's cloud-based platform solutions.
Sydney, Australia, August 27, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Sunera Technologies, Inc., a Platinum Oracle Partner and an elite Oracle Partner in North America, is pleased to announce that the company has recently acquired Envizion Tech Pty Ltd and part of well-known Australian testing automation consulting firm Acolade Consulting Pty. Ltd.
As a leading cloud-based platform solutions and enterprise application service provider for over 100 clients globally, SuneraTech Cloud and Platforms Solutions (including CloudTestr, DevOpsXpress and BIXpress) have transformed the way businesses manage and outsource applications support and maintenance.
Watch Michelle Bencomo, HRIS Manager at Activision Blizzard speak about her experience with Cloudtestr here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IkJnez0SStw
Through this acquisition Sunera Technologies is looking forward to building a strong presence in Australia and New Zealand under the new brand name Sunera Technologies Pty. Ltd.
As organizations are embracing cloud and platforms, SuneraTech platforms CloudTestr, DevOpsXpress, BIXpress has enabled organizations to drive IT predictability, productivity, and innovation.
Expressing his pleasure about the acquisition of Acolade Consulting Pty. Ltd and Envizion Tech Pty Ltd, the President of Sunera Technologies Inc. Ravi Reddy said, "We are excited about this acquisition and look forward to assisting organizations in ANZ in leveraging SuneraTech value proposition – enabling innovation, pursuing operational efficiency and customer intimacy.”
The acquisition of Envizion Tech Pty Ltd by SuneraTech is certainly great news from Australia and New Zealand based customers that have Oracle footprint, including Oracle E-Business Suite, Oracle Fusion Applications, Oracle Cloud, Oracle Fusion Middleware or customers looking for a testing automation platform.
Underlining the importance of this acquisition, the CEO of the just formed Sunera Technologies Pty. Ltd., Rajesh Krishnan said, “Being part of SuneraTech is significant considering all the unique and innovative platforms and value propositions that SuneraTech brings to customers globally. I believe organizations in ANZ will also be significantly benefited from the automation platforms, global consulting (implementation and support) experience and end-to-end services capabilities.”
To find out more about SuneraTech Australia, please visit http://www.suneratech.com/
About Sunera Technologies:
Sunera Technologies, Inc. (SuneraTech) is a leading cloud-based platforms and enterprise solutions provider specializing in Oracle applications and technologies. Based out of San Jose, California, SuneraTech employs over 850 technologists spread across multiple locations in the Americas, Asia, Australasia, and Europe.
About Acolade:
Acolade is a premium IT solutions provider founded in 2000, specializing in the areas of application testing and providing high end solutions around the quality management products. The company addresses the critical challenges of today's business community with innovation and initiative.
